welcomeMessageTitle: You invest in my world’s potential
welcomeMessageSubTitle: I focus on accelerated, emerging, innovative technology that can unlock long-term value and effective growth.
summaryTitle: Highly qualified and well-established in collaborating for fast–paced solutions.
summaryDescription: Experienced developer focused on leading and programming efficient processes using knowledge of requirements, client relations, training and secure conceptions.
summaryPoint1: Fully billingual for spoken and written in French and English
summaryPoint3: Extensive knowledge with Cloud and onPrem technologies
summaryPoint4: Tech savvy, with the ability to quickly learn and apply new software applications to the position.
summaryPoint5: Efficient communication skills for discussing projects at all levels, with the ability to clearly articulate the work, issues and challenges.
summaryPoint6: Expert in achieving high levels of multi-tasking by remaining focused and goal-oriented.
projectsSubTitle: For security reasons, I will be referring to the projects anonymously and only to the technical aspect.
projectAObjectiveDescription: Create a web-based solution to evaluate the effectivness of different artificial intellengence facial recongnition algorythyms. Run the scenario physically between different ellaborated stations. After capturing the data, build reports and statistics for upper management to complete the decision and move to the next phase of the project (out of 5).
projectARoleDescription: For this solution, I was acting as developer and consulting with senior colleages to produce an effecient system. Unfortunately, I was moved away from the project before finishing the web platform because of funding and resource issues.
projectBObjectiveDescription: Design a rapid solution enabling border agents to efficiently and quickly enter data from their computers or mobile devices. Migrate data from the legacy system and configure a reporting dashboard based on the new data source.
projectBRoleDescription: For this solution, I acted as a developer and collaborated with my colleagues.
projectCObjectiveDescription: Create a fast-paced solution for technical and non-technical members to create requests and collaborate on the forms. Complete data migration from previous system and setup reporting dashboard to the new datasource.
projectCRoleDescription: For this solution, I was acting as team lead and managing my resources and clients expectations to complete the solution effectively.
projectDObjectiveDescription: Create a fast-paced solution for managers, directors, executive directors and director generals to submit requests for suboordonite overtime and escalate for approval. Complete data migration from previous Excel system and setup reporting dashboard to the new datasource.
projectDRoleDescription: For this solution, I was acting as team lead and managing my resources and clients expectations to complete the solution effectively.
computerEngineeringTime: Enrolled at La Cité Collégiale in September 2018
computerEngineeringDescription: After graduating high school, I enrolled to La Cité and moved to Ottawa, Ontario.
supportAteTime: Hired at Hawkesbury General Hospital from Mai 2019 to August 2019
supportAteDescription: Got started at my first summer internship
softwareDevelopmentTime: Changed programs at La Cité Collégiale in January 2020
softwareDevelopmentDescription: After spending 2 years in the engineering program and realizing i would prefer focusing on the software aspect instead of the electrical, I transfered my credits to the adjacent program Software Development.
softwareDevelopmentGraduatedTime: Graduated from La Cité Collégiale in April 2022
juniorApplicationDeveloperTime: Hired at Canada Border Services Agency on January 2021
juniorApplicationDeveloperDescription: Obtained my second internship and casual position under Accelerated Innovative Emerging Technologies (AIET), Business Technology Information Directorate (BTID), Information Science Technology Branch (ISTB), Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) while completing my college program.
programmerAnalystTime: Promoted at Canada Border Services Agency on January 2022
programmerAnalystDescription: While waiting for my graduation, my acting manager promoted me to IT-02 indeterminate.
teamLeadTime: Promoted at Canada Border Services Agency on November 2024
teamLeadDescription: Promoted to acting for 1 year trial. Manager in progress to procure indeterminate or acting extension based on available funding.
getInTouch: Get in touch and let's make something happen
getInTouchDescription: This short showcase hopefully peaked your interest to contact me for more details. I look forward to hearing from you.
